SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
*cough* Dumped in the ocean?
Why!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I don't know, but we need
to find dry land, and fast!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar har har! Ye all right there, lasses?
Hoist anchor, lads! We got wee minnows
what needs savin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, but the pirates be catchin' up while
we was savin' the minnows... Think, Ivar!
Think! It's time to be comin' up with
a whale of an idea!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Ye all right there, minnows? Gar, what were ye
doin' out there in the briny blue? Did ye run
aground in a storm? And who be ye, anyway?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
We didn't intend to end up in the water—
and likely would have drowned if not
for your swift thinking, so thank you. I'm Formina, and this is Bonnie.
We've come here in search of a triangle.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yer names are Cornelia and Pony, and ye be
lookin' for a triangle? Gar, but we reeled in
some strange ones today, lads!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I be Ivar, captain of the Sea Turtle.
Finest ship on the blue, so she be!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: MerchantShipSailor
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Baltasar's firing at us, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Keep yer damn breeches on, lad!
He can't be reachin' us from there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
So Baltasar be gettin' himself a new
cannon, eh? Well, the ocean can take
his bones, says me! All hands, ready for close-quarter combat!
Hoist the mainsail! All arms at the ready, lads!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
If I ain't mistaken,
this here's a pirate ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, it be that fair and true!
Baltasar the pirate is comin'
after the goods we carry!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Bwaaa ha ha ha! I gotcha, Ivar!
Now hand over the egg and maybe
I'll let yer pathetic crew live.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, I don't trust ye far as I can throw ye!
If I be handin' me crew over to ye,
they'll dance at the end of a rope
before the day be out!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Aw, c'mon! I raised ya, remember?
Even a pirate king has a soft spot
for his own boy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
This fiend raised you? Wow.
Also, what's this egg he mentioned?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, ye always were a bilge-suckin' rat!
Fine then. Take the damn egg—and may
ye never have a day's luck with it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Ya chose well, boy. Stand down, men!
I promised to spare their lives,
so that's what I'm gonna do... AFTER we set their ship on fire!
Bwaaaaaa ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Why, ye blasted sea snake!
How am I supposed to be makin'
a livin' without me ship!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Figure it out.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
And we're right back in the sea.
Can you swim, Ivar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Every pirate worth his grog can be swimmin'!
Now follow me to land! Stroke! Stroke!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Me precious Sea Turtle's burnin'!
She be in so much pain... *sniff* Damn that Baltasar! Next time I
see him, I'll pull out his guts
and use 'em for garters!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
What was that egg? It must be special
if a fiend is in such hot pursuit.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Do ye really not know Deus Maris's egg,
minnows? Gar, but ye really are from
across the briny blue...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Well then, here be a tale, fair and true!
These waters have a god of the sea that
hatches from a mighty egg. Takes years, so it do—sometimes decades—
but when Deus Maris finally be hatched,
he ascends to heaven in a mighty cyclone.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
But before he goes, Deus Maris be grantin'
a wish to whoever hatched the egg. Gives ye
anything, so he does. Riches, fame, strength—
ye have but to name it, and it be yours.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: That's all a bit far-fetched. But assuming I believe your tale, why would you be in possession of such an incredible treasure?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, 'twasn't mine. I only be hired to transport it,
but somehow Baltasar caught wind and wise. I hear
he'll ask Deus Maris to turn him back to a man,
though I think he's better suited as a fiend.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
The egg be what turned him fiend
in the first place. Yar, me father and Baltasar used to be true
mates on the sea, but when the most recent
egg hatched, me father died, and Baltasar
turned into the monster ye be seein' earlier.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
With me father a dead man, Baltasar raised me
as his own. I was but a wee minnow when it
happened, so I don't be rememberin' me real
father, nor Baltasar's true face.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
But here's what I can't wrap me head around:
what kinda wish coulda killed one of 'em and
turned the other into a fiend? Yar, maybe it's
best to leave such wishes be...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
An unconditional wish is literally too good
to be true—meaning it simply doesn't happen.
You must give something to gain something;
that is how balance and order are maintained.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gahar har har! Ye be a funny one, Cornelia!
And yet, yer words give me a sense'a peace
I've not felt in a whale's year. Aye, a man's gotta think long and hard
if he be makin' a wish of Deus Maris,
as such a thing's like to blow back
on ye more than not.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Er, my name is Formina, actually.
...Never mind. What do we do now?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
First, we be getting off this island!
Plenty'a wreckage washes up here, so it do,
and we'll use it to build a raft and sail to
freedom! That is, assumin' ye wanna help?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I don't see us having much choice
in the matter unless we want to spend
the rest of our days marooned here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Then from this moment on, minnows, ye be
proud members of Cap'n Ivar's crew! But seein' as yer the lowest-rankin' sailors
here, ye gotta be doin' everything I say.
Now get to work, ye blasted lazybones!
Build us a raft, and do it well!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: You heard that voice, right, darlin'?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
The one that told us to 'take the triangle away'?
Yes, I heard it—and if this Deus Maris was the
entity that summoned us here, that might have
been his way of making a wish.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
I thought that feller was the one
who made wishes come true.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Regardless, we have to be the ones who find
the triangle; this isn't a scenario where it'll
all wrap up nice and neat so long as we make
a wish on Deus Maris's egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Well then, sounds like ol' long, tall,
and pirate-y there is our ticket off this
island. Now let's get to buildin' a raft.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Yar, that be a solid raft, minnows! 
Also, ye hold deep conversations and got
weird names; who even be ye, exactly,
and why did you come to these waters?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
We're here to find a triangle—
it will look like one of these.
Have you seen one before?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, but the Mare Nostrum is vast;
ye'll never find nothin' so small
floatin' about its waves. Don't look so disappointed, minnows!
If ye like, Captain Ivar will help
ye search for yer prize.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: That would be wonderful. Thank you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gahar har har! It always be smooth sailin'
with Captain Ivar at yer side!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
But it also be the newbies' job to row,
so get to rowin', minnows!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Aye aye, Cap'n!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
Gar, I thought raft-buildin' might be
too much for those scrawny arms, minnows. Ho, lads! Get this raft assembled before
I be assemblin' me boot up yer arses!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: MerchantShipSailor
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text: Aye, Captain! Right away!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_START_PROCESS_000.text:
By the way, minnow... Yer name's odd as old
fish guts, and the things ye say make no sense.
So tell me true! Who are ye, and for what purpose
did ye come to this sea?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
I come bearin' ill news, boss: that scabrous
knave Baltasar stormed the Sea Turtle,
seized the goods, and set her to burn.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
Blast it all! That fiend knows I built
the Sea Turtle with my own two hands,
and he went ahead and burned her anyway! I might feel more forgiving if he were at
least the type to make timely payments
for the work I do for him, but he doesn't
have that going for him either.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
I take it you'll need a new boat, Ivar?
Hard to make a living without one.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: Yar, but I be havin' no coin.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: Why are all my customers broke? Well, turns out we've got bigger problems than your empty purse: my architect went chasing after some skirt again, and now he's gone missing.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text:
By grog, does that blasted simpleton fall
in love with every lass he sees!? Fine then. I'll be findin' yer architect;
I'll clap him in irons and drag him home
in a sack if I have to. But once I do, cully,
ye'll build me a new ship for free.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: I never work for free, Captain, but how about we say I'll give it to you at a very steep discount. No deposit required.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: I'll be holdin' ye to that, cully!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_000_CUT_.text: Does that ship look a little...off?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Fiends be all over 'em! We gotta get in
there and help before their ship ends
up at the bottom of the briny blue!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text: The two of us are fine, but that fiend attack has simply ruined our honeymoon! Isn't that right, babygirl?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Yeaaah, but the fiends are, like,
totally gone now, so maybe we can
just enjoy ourselves or whatever?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Gar, but it be the architect!
Back to the shipyard with ye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
I think not, sir! I am currently on
a honeymoon with my babygirl!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Get yer scurvy tush in gear before
I use yer teeth for confetti!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Good heavens, this raft is the most
rickety thing I've ever...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text:
Hmmm... But wait... Yes... Yes!
Just feel the balance! The flow!
The sophisticated triangular design! O, glorious envy! Your fires rage within me!
The desire to build ships burns in my breast!
Quickly, man! Now! To the shipyard!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PASSENGER_SHIP_00.text: Aye, but good at his job.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Why is there so much wreckage
on this island?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
It be the work of currents for the most part,
but there also be a killer whale nearby that
attacks ships and devours all souls aboard.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
And by chum, do they ever look tasty!
Can't say how long I've been wantin'
to bite into one of 'em! Gahar har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Nay, just me. But whatever
be floatin' yer boat, says I!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Heavens, it's Captain Ivar!
Oh, now this IS a relief!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Washed up ashore alone, I see.
Shame the comely lass abandoned ye.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Uh... No! No, it's not like that at ALL, sir!
You see, our ship was attacked by a whale,
but just before it sank, my babygirl grabbed
me and threw me overboard, saving my life!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
Oh, my darling! My precious! My love!
I live only because of you, babygirl!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_DESERT_ISLAND_000.text:
You were dumped. Make peace with it.
Also, get on the raft already.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text:
There are a lot of fiends circling;
they must have found something.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text:
Gar, there probably be somethin'
tasty swimmin' beneath 'em.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text:
Gahaaar har har! That be me stomach,
minnows! She rumbles like an old cannon
whenever I see a tasty-lookin' fiend.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_RAFT_EVENT_000_CU.text: Clearly we have very different tastes.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
There you are! I'm not even going to ask
where you were or why—just get in there
and design Ivar a ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Right then! I've already got the basic framework
in mind, so I'll just add a few personal touches
based on Captain Ivar's preferences and...
Yes, take this... Move this here...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
And now for the finishing touch!
Captain Ivar? If you would be so kind?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Best let them do it, Captain; your luck
hasn't exactly been stellar of late.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Yar, go on, minnows. Add the final stroke.
They say it be good luck, so they do!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text: Well, good luck out there, Ivar. And for the love of Deus Maris, try to keep this one afloat.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Surrenderin' already, minnows?
Fine, just give it here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
We be ready to sail now, by gar!
But before we hoist anchor, I need grub!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
It's yer lucky day, minnows—I'm gonna
fix ye me world-famous Pirate Surprise!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Oh, this is exciting! I've always wanted
to have a seafood feast aboard a ship!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
And here it be! One Pirate Surprise!
Go on now, minnows! Eat hearty!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
*chomp* Oh wow, this is really good!
I've never tasted anything like it.
What am I eating, exactly?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Fiend meat, minnow! Yar, it be quite
low in fat and surprisingly healthy!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Fiend meat is...good?
What a shocking discovery.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Gar, but it be the finest flavor in all the
seas, says I! 'Tis the only thing in the world
that can satisfy me insatiable hunger!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_010_CUT_.text:
Aye, but that was the finest of meals...
Now hoist anchor, lads! We make for the
Southern Trade Port to take on cargo and
tell 'em the sad tale of the stolen egg!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Ivar! You're alive! When I heard the
Sea Turtle sank, I figured you went
down with the ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Yar, I managed to get out,
but Baltasar stole the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
I KNEW using the egg to make a quick buck
was a stupid idea! That's just not the
kind of cargo a decent person deals with.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Gar, don't be givin' up now! Ye gave me
the down payment for the egg, and I'll
get it back, fair and true.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
In that case, I hear Baltasar can
be found at the blue hole. It's apparently VERY bright at the moment,
and his ship is just sailing in circles
around it for...some reason.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
If it be glowing, it means that feculent
maggot Baltasar is up to no good... Yar, then that's where we're headin'!
But first, I'll be needin' some cargo—
can't chase down a rat without
a bit'a gold linin' me pockets.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Just don't push yourself.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
And how do you suggest we go about
pilfering an egg from a pirate?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Gahar har har! We'll be figurin' that
out once we get there, ye wee minnows!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, that there be an endless pit where
Deus Maris is said to descend from the
heavens—and while I can't say what Baltasar
be schemin', I know the egg is involved.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Ye'll understand if ye ever hold the egg,
minnow, but a man just can't help talkin'
sweet to the thing.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
This egg sounds like trouble.
Do you really talk to it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, and it be talkin' back,
right into your noggin! Now that I think on it, the same thing
happened when I dragged ye outta the brine.
The egg told me to drop anchor, and I found
ye lot sputterin' in the waves not long after.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
And you think this egg also
told Baltasar to go there?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, perhaps—for the egg takes
no man's wishes for free.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, what be the meanin' of this,
ye rotten cockroach!? Where be the egg?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
I should ask the same, ya blasted
fart-smeller! The egg went and
threw itself into the damn ocean!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Gahaaar har har har har!
Sounds like it hates ye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
Shut up, ya blasted boy! I'm gonna sink yer...
Oh, hell. I give up. I'll never be findin'
the egg in a sea this deep. So long.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
So long? SO LONG!? That's all ye got
to say after sinkin' a man's ship!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUEHOLE_000_CUT_.text:
The Blue Demon be out and about
in these parts, Ivar. Watch yerself.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text: What's that blue ship there, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Aye, that ship belong to Azure, sworn guardian
of Deus Maris. She be ruthless against any
pirate who seek the egg, and they all be
rightly terrified of her! Oh, but don't go worryin' about it,
minnows, 'cause we're not pirates. Gahar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
But enough'a that tale! I swore I'd never
give up tryin' to find the egg, and now
it be at the bottom of the deep!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
But you can talk to the egg, yes?
If so, why not try calling out to it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Er...yar? That might actually work. Go on,
boys! Get to wishin'! Wish for the egg to
come outta hidin' with everything ye got!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
I made that suggestion as a bit of a lark;
I had no idea the egg would ACTUALLY rise
up out of the sea! It clearly has a bit of
a thing for you, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Yar, it be likin' me more than Baltasar,
at the very least. Now raise those sails
high, lads! We make for the southern harbor.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text: If the blue ship lets us go.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
You said Deus Maris goes back to heaven
on a cyclone, right, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_PROCESS_000_C.text:
Aye, which means me wish will be comin'
true if we get to the cyclone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.text:
This storm is so intense!
Will your ship hold together?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.text: Gar, we can't even get close!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_SOUTH_0.text: Fiends flew out of the cyclone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
Those gar-blasted fiends took the egg!
After them, me hearties!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
We can't stay here, Captain!
The ship is going to fall apart!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text: Gar, I lost the egg again...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
Yes, but we're alive and the ship
is intact, which is all that matters.
We can try for the egg again later.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_WQT_STORM_BATTLE_.text:
Gahar har har! Yer startin' to sound like
true women of the sea, minnows! Aye, but ye only be half-right: while we be
needin' a boat, what we really be needin'
is a BIGGER boat! Now let's sail to port
and get us some coin!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Glad to see you in one piece, Ivar. But I've got
bad news: the cyclone you tried to throw yourself
into wasn't the Pillar to Heaven—we would've been
able to see the Pillar from all the way out here. It's an understandable mistake, though,
considering you've never seen it before.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Gar, this be all me fault...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Look, anyone holding the egg would do the
same thing the moment they saw a cyclone.
And honestly, I think it's great that you care
enough about your wish to stake your life on it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Those blasted old men really put you through the wringer—treated you like a dirty thief whenever you wanted something, which turned you into a kid who didn't want anything.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Yar, belay that talk, harbormaster!
I be full-grown now, and I want me
cut of the goods same as any!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Aw! It's so sweet to see my
cute little Ivar all grown up!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
It sounds like you were a
surprisingly good kid, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Stow it, minnow! ...Now then, harbormaster,
have ye any work for us? We've not much time,
and I'm needin' to make a fine haul so I can
buy meself a larger ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Hmmm... Well, I've got a couple of ideas.
You can either get the scientist out at the
lighthouse to draw up a lease agreement, or you
can reclaim stolen goods from a pirate base. Both options are dangerous in their own ways,
so I'll leave the choice to you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Yar, I be not excited about the pirate base.
We can't even be gettin' there with our sloop,
so we'll need to go back to the shipyard
and switch over to a raft.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Let's just pick something
and get after it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text:
Oh, I almost forgot. You saved a passenger
ship a while ago, right? Well, they wanted
me to pass something along in thanks.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTH_TRADE_PORT_.text: Oh? Thank you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text: Tra la la la la! Oh! Hello there, friend! I am Carolina, a wandering minstrel. Now take a seat—quietly—and listen to my rapturous song.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
Yar, it be Carolina! We're in luck,
minnows—'tis rare to cross her path.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
High atop the tower,
void of all its light.
The color that brings happiness
is of the sea so bright. Yet when this tale unfolds,
what evil should appear?
The very worst of all the beasts...
The one all pirates fear! HEY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
Tra la la la lay!
Agents of chaos on water are they!
Their hiding place, hey!
Their hiding place, ho!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
AAAND...KEY CHANGE!
I say hey—HEY! And then ho—HO!
And a shaba-dabba-do
that I sing just for you! HEY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Carolina
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
Alas, I can't claim to understand that one
very well, but I'll pray for your success.
And now, I must be off. WAH-HOOOOOO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
I say hey—HEY! And then ho—HO!
Yar, damn me eyes! That song's gonna be
stuck in me head for the rest of the day.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAROLINA_000_CUT_.text:
There seemed to be some hidden meaning there.
We should probably head over to the pirates'
secret place—which I take it is their base.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Hello? Please, help me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Another victim!? Yar, we be comin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Oh, thank you so much, my friends!
I may be a marine researcher, but I was
very close to being fish food!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Those violent pirates sunk my ship
and cast me adrift—I've been out
here for three days and nights!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, 'tis a pity. But tell me, man,
did ye see a pirate named Baltasar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Sadly, my hearty friend, I research
large sea creatures, not pirate monikers. But there's a more important issue: my research
notes have been washed away! Those notes are of
vital import to the scientific community at large,
so I implore you to look for them with all haste!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Have ye seen how vast the ocean be?
'Tis a fool's errand to even look.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
When you say 'large sea creatures,'
are you referring to Deus Maris?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
What a clever lady! Indeed, the creature
known as Deus Maris in these parts is
believed by people of science to be
some manner of large sea creature!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: He knows something about Deus Maris.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: This man is a waste of our time.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
If yer researchin' Deus Maris, cully,
ye might be good for somethin' after all.
We'll help ye find yer missin' notes.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Oh, thank you so much! Now then, I have two missing 
notebooks. They both have a water-resistant coating
and boast magnificent buoyancy, so you should be
able to find them floating on the water's surface.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
That sounds much easier than trying
to locate them underwater, at least.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, don't be gettin' yer hopes up, minnows!
The sea be vast, and we've plenty of other
business to attend to besides.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Gar, ye egghead! We'll be droppin' ye off
at the next port; ye should be able to
book passage on another ship there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yes, of course—and thank you again.
You saved my life this day.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
My notes! Oh, but this is just wonderful!
They're undamaged, and the data is intact.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, but 'tis passin' strange—
yer log be lookin' different from mine.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
You came from an outer ocean, didn't you?
Just like the two of us.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Yes, yes! Precisely so.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
THREE outsiders...? Yar, is all the sketchy
folk showin' up lately a sign Deus Maris's
ascension be near?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Those are my research notes! And those fiends are...sniffing them? Fascinating...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Also playing with them, nibbling them,
and throwing them around. Are you sure
the contents are going to be all right?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: I say, they're treating my log like a toy! Oh, but this is simply brillia... Wait, no! This is TERRIBLE! Those fiends are going to destroy my life's work!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: *sigh* Fine. Hold on.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
They're back! My beloved research notes!
I am now one step closer to unlocking
the mysteries of the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Good. Now tell us what you know
about this 'large sea creature.'

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yes, well, while you did indeed help me and
I very much appreciate it, this data is far too
advanced for the layperson to even begin—

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Spill it before I pull out yer tongue
and toss ye over the side!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
EEEEEEP! Er, I mean, o-of course, sir!
You may consider class in session! The creature you call the Deus Maris shares traits
with so-called 'divine' beings from other worlds,
including transcendental power, the ability to
grant blessings, and a most majestic presence.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
In contrast to genuinely divine beings,
however, Deus Maris has a life cycle—
hence Deus Maris's egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yar, just stop talkin', egghead.
I ain't followin' a thing ye say.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Yes, I rather feared that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Shh! Don't interrupt, Captain.
This is important.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Don't be shushin' me, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Right. Now then, if Deus Maris's egg were to remain in this world, it would be a mere egg like any other. However, this creature has a life cycle that actually straddles the Conjoined Worlds using the egg form! It's remarkable!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text: Then what IS the egg, exactly?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Deus Maris's egg is a vessel which contains
the will of every life-form in this world—
or perhaps the more poetic 'sentiment'
is a better word than 'will.' All manner of sentiments find their way
across the sea and into that egg, at which
point it exchanges them for power in the
Conjoined Worlds to which it is connected.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Some posit that a portion of the exchanged power
can be used to grant wishes, but this is mere
conjecture at the moment. Also, we have no idea
where Deus Maris goes once it ascends to heaven. Indeed, I've only just begun my journey
into researching this most magnificent
of marine creatures!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Yes, well, my thanks again for the help.
I will now be returning to my...ocean.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
Gar, me head be achin' fit to split.
Did ye follow any of that, minnows?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
It sounds like the sentiments of
everyone in the world eventually
find their way to Deus Maris's egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_VICTIM_SHIPWREACK.text:
So the egg came outta the sea because it was
respondin' to me sentiments? Yar, but there
be only one sentiment I have for true...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Ho, minnow! See where that black ship be
anchored? See the crack in the cliff beyond?
That be the base of the White Whale Pirates.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
The blue ship belongs to the Azure woman,
yes? What is she doing here...?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
If she came here for a fight, minnows,
we'd be seein' one already. Yar, but
Baltasar's ship is on alert regardless,
and we'll not be sneakin' past.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
Then let's head for the Blue Demon first.
If they are planning to interrupt us,
we can just chase them off.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
A plan too bold even for ye, minnows.
We'll see how big ye are on that plan
after ye get the chance to meet Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.text:
Only tars that be knowing the route can sail
these caves on a ship, minnows; we're likely
to sink if we try it. What should we do?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.text: A raft could get past the shoals.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_CAVE_UNABLE_000_C.text:
Yar, that be one way to do it.
Let's get back to the shipyard
and switch to our raft!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
We be feelin' a raft ride today!
Have ye one we can plunder?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
Sure. The one the two of you made
a while back is surprisingly sturdy,
so I've kept it tied to the pier.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
One raft, square and true! Now we can get
through the reef without runnin' aground or
going through the sea caves—'cause there
be fiends in the caves, by gar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_CHANGE_S.text:
Not sure I should be choosin' how we
approach this fight, minnows, so I'll
be leavin' that to ye.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
The blue ship belongs to
that Azure woman, yes?
What is she doing here...?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
If she came here for a fight, minnows,
we'd be seein' one already. Yar, but
Baltasar's ship is on alert regardless,
and we'll not be sneakin' past.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Then let's head for the Blue Demon first.
If they are planning to interrupt us,
we can just chase them off.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
A plan too bold even for ye, minnows.
We'll see how big ye are on that plan
after ye get the chance to meet Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
I met Azure at the harbor when I was but a
wee sprat. She was starin' a hole through me,
and I found it terrifyin'. Yar, it still shivers me timbers just to
think about it! Never did work up the guts
to talk to the lass.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
So you're scared of her despite never actually
speaking to her? What if you've just had the
wrong impression about her this whole time?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Gar, but those eyes... If I see 'em...
Nay, we daren't.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Don't push yourself, Captain.
We can do it for you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
No one's here—not even a guard.
That seems odd.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Gar, it's just as the rumors say:
Azure pilots the Blue Demon alone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: I am NOT alone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: The souls of guardians move my ship. Many, many guardians.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Like a ghost ship?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
This is all you pirates' fault! You tortured
the guardians to learn more about Deus Maris,
then you killed them for fun! But I am now the final guardian, and I'm
going to make VERY sure that every pirate
pays for those crimes!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Is that true, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Yar, I be no pirate! But I know
someone who was: me father.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
You were born and raised by pirates, Ivar!
Deus Maris doesn't want you making
a wish on the egg—the fact you lost it
in the cyclone is proof of that. Listen to me. Unless you want to die,
just go home and forget about this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: So what are you doing here, Azure?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
I came to confirm whether or not Baltasar had
the egg—and planned to kill him if he did.
But since he's yet to obtain it, my work
in this place is pretty much wrapped up.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
And now I've a question for you, strangers:
Why do you pursue Deus Maris's egg?
Do you intend to make a wish?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Yes, for the triangle.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: No.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
We came to these seas in search of a triangle.
If we can get it by wishing on Deus Maris,
that's what we intend to do.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Wishes come with a price, strangers.
Best stand ready to pay the cost.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
The guardian spirits stir...
You must leave this place at once!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
With the ship gone,
we can get into the base.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Aye, but the guard on Baltasar's ship should
be down now, so the sneakin' will be easier.
So then, minnows, about what ye—

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
You're asking about the wish, right? Well,
it's true. We don't plan on stealing the
wish from you, but we will if we must.
Please know it's nothing personal.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
Yar, I know ye got yer own goals,
and I won't hold it against ye.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text: Do not lie to me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
You have come to our waters from an outer ocean
for a reason, strangers—and Deus Maris knows
what it is! You can hide nothing from him!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_BLUE_DRAGON_SHIP_.text:
The wish? Yes, that's true. I thought we could
get away with not saying anything, but she
wouldn't let it go until I admitted the truth.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
With the Blue Demon gone, the pirates be
lowerin' their guard and returnin' to land.
That's fair luck for us, minnows!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, these be Baltasar's quarters.
Mangy cur's probably off drinkin'
himself under some table or another.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
By Deus Maris, there be a jade urn
on his desk! Can we really take it,
or is this a trap?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: ...Nothing happened.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
We be some lucky ones today.
Now let's be splittin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Guard incoming!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, what be the password!?
I say hey—HEY!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: And then ho—HO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: And a hey to you, my good man.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, by the hells! I didn't know you lot
were back already! Now take my shift!
I wanna go off and drink with all the
cute lasses while I still can!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Aye, aye.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Say, you're actually kinda cute.
When did you join the crew?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Pirate1
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: URK!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Stop clownfishin' around and get yer
damn cheeks back to the raft, minnows!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Kind of cute? Rude.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yar, Ivar! Ya really gonna come all this
way and not say hello to yer old man?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Yer only me father when it be convenient!
Ye treated me like dirt me whole life,
and I be wantin' nothin' to do with ye!
...Oh, and I'll be takin' this jade urn.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text: Heh.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
There's more and more of them.
This can't be good.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
You can take that with ye, Ivar,
but I'll be keepin' the lasses here.
Seem useful, so they do.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Sadly, being a fiend lackey wasn't on my
calendar today—but be a better man and
maybe I'll think about it. Now let's go.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_PIRATE_ISLAND_000.text:
Sailors from an outer ocean...
Aye, we've dangerous sharks in
our midst now, me hearties.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Ho! Scientist! Ye be in?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Nope!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Don't lie to me, ye old salt,
or I'll have ye swabbin' the deck!
Now get out here!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Demanding little whippersnapper, ain'cha?
Here on behalf of the southern harbormaster,
I take it? Well, you can go pound sand!
I'm not signing any contract, nohow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Then we'll be haulin' ye outta
here by force! Get 'im, lads!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
All right, all right! No need for that!
Kids these days, I swear... Fine, then. How does this sound?
You help me with a little experiment,
and I'll sign whatever you like.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Here's the experiment: will you press
the red button, or the blue?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Yar, this be not me forte, says I.
Go for it, minnows.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
You remember Carolina's song, right?
'High atop the tower, void of all
its light. The color that brings
happiness is of the sea so bright. Yet when this tale unfolds,
what evil should appear?
The very worst of all the beasts,
the one all pirates fear!'

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: WAH-HOOOOOO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Was that an explosion!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
It's done! IT'S DONE! At long last, the lamp
has been destroyed! Now I don't have to be
the lighthouse keeper anymore! WAH-HOOO!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Damn yer brainy bones!
Ye used us!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Yes, and now I have a warning: ghosts tend to
appear in the lamp room, you see, and whenever
I turn the light on, they immediately switch
it back off again. Now, while I'm not afraid of some half-
baked apparition, they ARE rather a pain.
...Hence the explosives.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
EEEEP! GH-GH-GH-GHOOOOOOST! Oh, but I'm no good with violence.
You handle this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Those don't be ghosts—they be fiends!
Get ready, minnows!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
That whole thing was just a fiend den.
Also, why make US push the button?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Because it's no fun if I do it! Don't you see? The joy lies in the endless possibilities within the choice of which button you're going to push!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
I got no idea what ye be talkin' about.
But we did yer little experiment,
so get to signin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Yes, yes. Thankfully, I read the fine print,
which says that in the event the lighthouse
is destroyed, the occupant is under no
obligation to work. Aaaaaand...signed!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
About time! Yar, minnows, all that hagglin'
worked me up a fearsome appetite. Let's get
back to the southern harbormaster and eat!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Quite the impressive appetite.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text: Was that an earthquake!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
It is done! Thanks to my triangular design,
my magnum opus is now launched! Looooook!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Gar, by all the slugs in the sea!
The Iron Island be MOVIN'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
With something so monstrous lurking about,
ships will stop coming to the bay entirely.
Why, we won't even NEED a lighthouse anymore!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Say, old man... Dare ye me
to be eatin' that thing?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Is food all you ever think about?
Yes, well, there you have it.
Contract signed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
Now then, I've no time to be conversing
with gluttons, so if you're finished here,
I'd kindly ask you to take a hike!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_LIGHTHOUSE_000_CU.text:
That's a warship. I can't imagine it's good to
have things from other worlds weaseling into
this one, so we'd best keep our distance.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
I'm impressed you handled that eccentric!
I just hope he didn't drag you into any of
his experiments with weird contraptions.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
He did that, aye. Couldn't make fin
nor tail of what he be askin',
but we made it out alive. I'm no good at this thinkin' stuff,
so I'm glad the minnow be with me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Well, that just leaves retrieving the stolen
goods, which I know is a lot more difficult.
Even if the reward IS pretty hefty...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Yar, ye'd have to be a mad dog
to go up against Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Well. I can't force you to do it...
Plus there's really no point if you die.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
No reason to be scared when
you have us, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Gahar har har! Ye've got quite the swollen
pair of heads for minnows! But if ye be so
confident, who be I to say nay?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
If you plan to head to the pirate base,
I suggest you switch over to a raft.
You'll never make it past those pesky
caves otherwise.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
This is the jade urn, all right; I'm impressed
you managed to get it back from Baltasar.
The client is going to be very happy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
And now we be havin' enough treasure
for a new ship! Gahar har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Oh, I actually paid the shipyard before you
even set out. I mean, I knew you needed
that ship, so why not?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
By me dirty breeches, I...
I don't be knowin' what to say.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Yes you do. Repeat after me:
'Thank you very much.'

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Quit peepin' in on me private monologues,
ye meddlin' minnow! Gar, but thank ye, harbormaster.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Oh, but I'm afraid I'm not all sunshine
and lollipops today; there's a group up
north that wants to see you about the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Yar, I figured. They paid the deposit fair
and true, and I ain't given 'em the goods.
I just hope they don't be sendin' me off
to the gallows...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Be careful, Ivar. The pirates around here
are growing more bold in their search for
the egg—they've even taken to attacking
each other as well as merchant ships.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
If they be havin' the stones to attack us,
we'll show 'em the color of their own guts!
Ain't that right, minnows!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Right behind you, Captain! ...At least
until we find a way out of this world.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Ha! I love it! Well, if you do happen to
take them out, bring their flag back to
me and I'll give you a nice reward.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text: Gar, now I hope they be attackin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text: Well, we don't!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
I've got something good for you: equipment
said to belong to a pirate of legend. It's old and
worn, but you might get some interesting use
out of it if you enhance it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Yar, this be worn like an old boot...
But if it's a present from ye,
I'll be takin' it gladly!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SOUTHHARBOR_TRADE.text:
Good luck. I tried using it in my younger
days, and things got...strange.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Architect
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
It's finally time to get your own sailboat!
As always, the schematics need a little bit
of your own magic worked on them—and you
might find it a tad tricky this time around!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text: Yer up, minnows! Give it yer all!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text: Fine, I'll do it! Give it here!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Gar, this mighty ship'll let us be takin' on
some real jobs now—but we best fill our
bellies before we set sail for the north.
Come, ye deck-swabbers! Meals on me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
I'll pass, thanks—I'm still full.
But hey, you have fun.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Say, but do you think you could tell me what
you know about Deus Maris and the egg?
I'm from an outer ocean, so I'm not really
clear on all of this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Certainly! So long ago, all eggs were raised by
guardians of Deus Maris. Whenever one hatched,
they would wish for Deus Maris to grow up
healthy and happy and send it on its way.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
They sound like saints. If I knew I could
get a wish to come true, the first thing
I'd do would be to make one for myself.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Deus Maris blessed this world,
oceans thrived, and there was peace. I should also mention I heard that part of
the story from Azure, so it might just be
something she said to paint her and the
other guardians in a good light.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Anyway, one day, a pirate stole the egg and made
a wish. The seas turned wild and choppy, pirates
started fighting over the egg, and the peaceful
waters were no more.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
That was how things were at least as far back
as my grandpappy's time, so all that 'peaceful
ocean' stuff might be an old myth. Who knows.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Yes, it is all a bit hard to believe.
But is Azure really the last guardian?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Apparently. She doesn't age, so there's no
reason it couldn't be true, but I have a
hard time believing much of anything she says. I mean, she's never said what the
guardians actually DID to protect
Deus Maris, so...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
So she's immortal and eternally young?
No wonder she didn't look like a
typical human...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Shipyardmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
We're all wondering who's going to find the
egg and make a wish this time. Probably doesn't
matter—I just hope the wish doesn't make
things worse for all of us who live here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Yar, that was a feast! Now we sail for the
northern harbor, lads! There's pirates about,
so keep a wary eye!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Gar, could it be?
Is Deus Maris callin' me?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_SHIPYARD_TANGRAM_.text:
Now that we have a new ship,
it's time for round two. Let's go!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text: Deus Maris's egg! It's back!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
It's like the cyclone appeared just to return
the egg to you, Captain. Does this mean
you're special to Deus Maris somehow?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Pirate_Leif
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
I knew it, ye dog! Ye came to the cyclone
because ye have the egg! Well, ye might
be the son of both Sigurd and Baltasar,
but ye'll never win against me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
These are the pirates after the egg?
Hmm. What should we do?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
I'll lay me bones in the cold ground
before I be handin' this egg over!
We be takin' it to the northern harbor.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text: Actually, let's hand it over.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text: Let's fight back!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Gar, yer right. Take it, ye scoundrels!
Take it and begone from me sight!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Pirate_Leif
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Har har! Yer a smart one, cully—maybe
ye'll live longer than most. Farewell!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Yar, though that egg could have been makin'
us rich, dead men spend no coin. We be doin'
the right thing there, says I.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Wait, it could have made you rich?
I'm so sorry—I had no idea.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
What's done be done, minnows. The egg be goin'
to Baltasar, for the northern harbor is
his stompin' ground. By givin' that pirate the egg, we be forcin'
him to fight Baltasar—which means all the
pirates are gonna be weaker! Gahar har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
A strategic withdrawal?
Pretty clever, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Listen close, minnows: all that be matterin'
is who hatches the egg at the end. Now keep
yer heads down and make for the north!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Yar, we best be hurryin' to the northern
harbor before the rest of those lice-
infested scum be catchin' up to us.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Pirate_Leif
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Now yer wounded AND ye've lost the egg.
A stupid decision! Everyone be knowin'
only the smartest sailors survive on these
here seas. Farewell, chumps! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text: I'm sorry we couldn't protect it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Gar, it be fine, minnows; it'd only end up in
Baltasar's claws anyway if we took it north,
for the harbor be his stompin' ground. Aye, better to be lettin' the egg go
and make the pirates squabble over it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
But we could have made a nice bit
of cash if we brought it to the harbor.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_STORM_CENTER_000_.text:
Don't be speakin' that aloud, minnow!
Ohhh, me poor precious egg...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Let's cut to the chase, Captain!
Where's the damn egg!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Yar, she be here, just as promised.
And your end'a the deal, cully?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Oh ho! Deus Maris's egg! It's miiine!
Thank the stars! I'd have been dead meat
if this deal fell through. Right then. Here's your money.
Now take it and get out!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Yar, now we can be payin' back
the southern harbormaster.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
What's going to happen to the egg?
Will that person make a wish on it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Nay, minnow. That egg be goin'
straight to Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Baltasar will never be lettin' the egg go,
which means we always know just where it be.
All we do now is steal it back from him
at the very last second! Gahar har har!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
That be the Pillar to Heaven, or me name
not be Captain Ivar! Yar, it be puttin' all
the other cyclones to shame.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Now things are finally
getting started.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Aye, minnows—and so be we!
Raise the sail, lads! Hoist anchor!
We be settin' course for a cyclone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text: The egg not be with me, says I.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
But I PAID you, you... You damn PIRATE!
Well, this is simply unacceptable.
Get out there right now and find it
before I lose my head!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Yar, I know where it be headed: to Baltasar,
strongest pirate in all the many seas.
Ye need not worry about it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Ye need not worry 'bout that neither!
I'll be handlin' that pox-faced louse.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Spoken like Baltasar's son, Captain.
Also, I'm holding you to that!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
Ivar must have a death wish.
Doesn't he know Baltasar is immortal?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text: Ho, Captain! Come here to trade?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_PARRO.text:
I be the captain of a trading vessel,
ye daft barnacle! What else would I
be doin' here!?
