SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
Yer the one who said the ship might have
something, ya measly poop-decker!
Hell, maybe I should hang YOU instead!
How'd ya like them apples!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
Listen here, friend. If I was to drink that
there immortality potion, it'd mean nothin'
in the world could kill me, right?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Dark_Merchant
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
Exactly so, my fair lady! Why, that's even
a guarantee I proudly print on the side
of every bottle!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
Then you best take a swallow
before Baltasar throws that
rope around your neck.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Dark_Merchant
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text: Are you mad!? I'd never survive that!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text: It is snake oil! I knew it! Listen here, Baltasar: Hangin' a no-good lout like this feller here ain't gonna do nothin' but make folks think mighty poorly of you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
Bwaaa ha ha ha! Oh, but you're a sharp one!
Well, as I be a man of mercy, I'll spare
his life...and also take his valuables! And if ya ever try to sell some fake potion
again, ya lyin' mongrel, I'll hang ya,
cut ya down, and hang ya again!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text: Yar, well done, minnows.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
We ain't gonna turn a blind eye to murder
no matter what world we're in!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Dark_Merchant
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
Damnation! I'm so scared of pirates,
I can't do my job! You go, Professor!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
So they're hiring bodyguards now?
Hell, where'd he go!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
Feller took a powder. Still, why don't you
ever fight, darlin'? You're immortal,
which means you got nothin' to fear.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
And cheapen my immortality? Never!
Besides, a true captain only throws
a punch when it counts.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BANDNED_GOO.text:
But next time I see that bastard,
I'm gonna hang him high!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text:
Well, if it isn't the great Baltasar!
How may I help you today, sir?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text:
Thought ya might have a pulse on things
around here—I be havin' a hankerin'
for somethin' wild and outrageous!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text:
Wild and outrageous? No, I don't...
Oh! What about Sigurd's parrot?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text: That cur's parrot is still alive!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text:
Bwaaa ha ha ha! That's him, all right!
How ya doin' there, me hearty?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: Parrot
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text: SCREW YOU! SCREW YOU! I HATE YOUR FACE!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text:
Yar, that be him, all right—this bird
treats me as poorly as Sigurd did. Ya got a deal, harbormaster—I'll take him.
Er, but do ya mind if I pay ya later?
I be a little short at the moment.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text:
Of course, of course!
Not a problem at all.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.speaker: NorthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_NORTHHARBOR.text:
Aaah ha ha ha ha! Yes! Yessssss!
I'm finally free of that damn bird!
Lock up the kids and grab a bucket,
because I'm gonna get loaded!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.speaker: Parrot
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.text: GIMME FOOD! GIMME FOOD! SO HUNGRY! ALSO BOOZE! NEED A PINT!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.text:
Cease yer chatter, ya damnable bird!
Yar, yer name be Pedro, right?
Well, Pedro, yer gonna be tellin'
me where Sigurd hid his treasure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.text: DON'T TELL BALTASAR! DON'T TELL HIM! SIGURD MADE ME PROMISE JUST BEFORE HE DIED! SO CRAM IT!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.text:
If ya don't tell me, I'll stuff ya
in a pie and feed ya to Ivar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_PEDRO_TREAS.text: YOUR TREASURE NOW! ALL YOURS! FOLLOW ME! FOLLOW ME!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Yer up, Ivar! Oh, but we ain't at
the blue hole, so no need to panic.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Gar, then I be divin' in.
Treasure, ahoy!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
You there! Bird! What the hell IS
Sigurd's treasure, anyway?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: DON'T KNOW! STUPID QUESTION! SIGURD DIDN'T TELL! NEVER TOLD!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Yar, I suppose he always was a crafty sort
like that. Hell, not like anyone would
have believed him anyway.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Gahar har har! Found it!
Surprised it be so small, but—

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: BUT IT'S MINE NOW! ALL MINE! THANKS, CHUMPS! ADIOS!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
The durn parrot flew off with the chest!
Suppose we'd best get after him.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
I'm gonna grill that thrice-damned
bird alive and feed it to Ivar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: FOLLOWED ME! FOLLOWED ME! WHAT JERKS! GONNA BEAT THE STUFFING OUTTA YOU NOW!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
If it's a tussle you want, pardner,
it's a tussle you're gonna get!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Stay on yer toes, lasses—if ya don't give
yer all against Sigurd's parrot, he'll use
yer guts to line the floor of his cage!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: SORRY. SO SORRY. MY FAULT. HERE'S THE TREASURE.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Yer a cute thing once ya behave.
Yar, then! Let's see what we got.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
What in the hells!? Ya call this a treasure,
ya squawkin' bastard!? Best be handin' it
over now before I pluck ya bare!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: PEDRO'S INNOCENT! SO INNOCENT! ALL SIGURD'S FAULT!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Yar, I suppose ya be but a victim;
'tis the fault of that slimy eel, Sigurd. Still, there be nothin' in here but a
worthless triangle, which means I'm gonna
reach into Hell and strangle Sigurd
with his own guts! Go on, lasses. The treasure be yours.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Well, shoot! Didn't ever reckon
we'd find the triangle here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Well, Pedro, yer free now. Fly away!
Go live with yer kin in the sky!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Pedro
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: TREASURE! YOUR TREASURE! SO LONG, SUCKERS! SEE YA NEVER! ADIOS! ADIOS!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text: So was that there Pedro critter actually a bird?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_QUEST_.text:
Stow it, lass! That be Sigurd's parrot—
I'd recognize him anywhere.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.text:
Why, ya lyin' muskrat! Yer right here!
Also, I know ya be makin' a buncha weird
science things, so show 'em to me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.text:
I'm inclined to say no, seeing as your
very existence is an affront to the
entire natural order of the universe... But since you want to see my weird
science things, I'll overlook it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.speaker: scientist
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_LIGHTHOUSE_.text:
Now come see—no, come EXPERIENCE—
my very weirdest science thing!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
Dispatch the drone unit.
Do not allow them to approach.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
Prepare the type-three shrapnel shells.
I want covering fire on the drone.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipLieutenant
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
Type-three shrapnel shells
loaded and ready, sir!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text: Wait for the drone to engage.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipLieutenant
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
The enemy's withdrawing, sir!
Do we pursue?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipCaptain
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
No. We're low on ammo, and don't know
how much farther we'll need to travel.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.speaker: BattleshipLieutenant
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BATTLESHIP_.text:
Good! Continue our voyage
to our destination.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.text:
Just look at them birds soar!
They must love bein' so free.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.text:
Yar, they be me natural enemy—come
to peck at me dead flesh, they have!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.text: I though you were invincible, pardner.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_PIRATESHIP_BIRD_000_CU.text: Not to PAIN, ya daft seahorse!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Heh heh heh... What does the Dead Man's Ship
want at the shipyard, and why is a flesh-
and-blood human at the rudder? It's almost like I'm seeing a ghost...
except that I AM one! Heh heh heh!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Yar, ye steered us straight to the
shipyard, minnows! Who BE ye!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Bonnie Blair—me and Formina Franklyn here
are travelin' together in search of a triangle.
Got dropped into this here ocean, and next
thing we know, we're on the Dead Man's Ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Come from an outer ocean for a triangle,
have ye, Pony and Cornelia? Gar, now I see
why ye be steerin' a ship better than me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Reckon that's about the long and short of it.
Anyway, you seen any triangles in these parts?
Should fit in this space right here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
You three are talking like a captain
and mates who've never met before!
I take it your ship sunk, then?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Aye—but we've come here to
find a ship of a different sort.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
The son of Baltasar the pirate and sailors
from another sea riding the Dead Man's Ship
together? Oh, but this IS a thrilling tale!
You must tell me what happens next!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
What happens next ain't happened yet.
That's why we need us a ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Ohhh? Heh heh heh! In that case,
allow me to help you with the
next step of your adventure! When the shipyard asks for payment, you will
need two gems: Deus Maris's Sapphire,
and Deus Maris's Ruby.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
The boss of the shipyard knows of
the sapphire, but you'll need to find
the ruby yourself. Here's a spoiler, though: the sapphire
is said to be at the bottom of the
blue hole, the deepest area in all
the Mare Nostrum!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Heh heh! What will you do, adventurers?
Will you search for the sapphire in the
dangerous blue hole, or gather information
on the unknown ruby instead? Choose wisely, now—I'd HATE to see you
make the wrong decision! Heh heh heh!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Yar, I know where the blue hole be,
but have no idea about the ruby.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Aye, I will—but if ye have such power,
why not abandon me to me own fate and
go find the triangles ye seek?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Believe you me, I'd love that—but this
here ain't the time. So right now,
we're gonna travel with you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_000.text:
Yar, I'll not claim to understand ye, but I be
grateful for the help. Now let's find those
gems, take 'em to the shipyard boss, and tell
him the finest tale he's ever heard!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
This blue hole looks mighty deep.
Sure hope you can swim.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Are ye mad!? No one can swim that far!
And we've no proof it's fine in the
Sea Betwixt, either.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Say, that blue boat over yonder
wasn't here earlier, was it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Yar, that be Azure's ship, the Blue Demon!
What hole was she crawlin' out from!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
She might know how to tackle this,
considering how strange she was.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
I be not hopeful considering how she
was earlier, but we've little choice...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
It be empty. Yar, but tales of the sea
always did say Azure sailed it alone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Alone? Brrr... Makes me feel like a
goose just walked over m'grave.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
You have come, Ivar, Child of Pirates.
All is as Azure foretold.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Yar, this ghost be the one steerin' the ship!
But now that we're on the Sea Betwixt,
we can see its ghostly crew.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Say, this might be a plumb fool idea,
but couldn't a ghost dive down and get
that sapphire? I mean, seeing as they
ain't gotta worry about drownin' and all.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Azure bade me assist you in obtaining
the sapphire, but what will you see
done for me in return?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Not sugarcoatin' anything, are ye?
Well, I may be havin' pirates for parents,
but Ivar be a man honest and true.
Whatever I can do for ye, I will.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
The pirates put we guardians to the sword.
Azure is the only who remains, and she
fights all the endless days alone to
safeguard Deus Maris. So I ask this, Ivar, Child of Pirates:
save Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text: Gar, if only I be knowin' how!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
That is something you will need to figure
out for yourself, Ivar, Child of Pirates.
Now go forth and find the sapphire.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Well, you heard the spirit.
Good luck, Captain!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Yar, I've no blasted idea how
I'm supposed to save Azure!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Here is the Deus Maris's Sapphire.
Now go forth and find the ruby.
Save Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_00.text:
Reckon it's time for us to
follow our green line.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
Yar, 'tis the Northern Trade Port.
Be there commerce in the Sea Betwixt?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
We're lookin' for Deus Maris's Ruby.
You know anything about that?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
Are you sure you're not searching
for something else entirely?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text: Heck! Are you with the Quis Statoom?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
Hmm. So it's a transaction you want—
yet all transactions command a price.
What do you have to offer?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text: Take my will to overcome anything.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text: I ain't got nothin' to offer.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
A decisive choice. Most excellent!
Deus Maris's Ruby waits in the
hideout of the pirate Baltasar,
who leads the White Whales.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
This is an exquisite life.
At last, I am free...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
A callow choice, yet one most excellent!
Now overcome you shall...for your answer
lies beyond this battle!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
I'm afraid I don't accept lies.
You hold a strange triangle, yes?
Trade it to me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text: Then we make no bargain. Begone!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: NorthHarbourghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text:
You have overcome the challenge.
Deus Maris's Ruby waits in the
hideout of the pirate Baltasar,
who leads the White Whales.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
Yar, be waves of this size normal
in the Sea Betwixt?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
That's a mighty fiend that dwells in these
waters—one I've risked my life to pursue!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
Don't sweat the details! Chase it!
It's getting away!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
I knew it! That creature had swallowed
my research logs! Now I can continue
my research on Deus Maris! Huzzah!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
Yar, he be vanishin'! But he left his
log behind when his soul passed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
Wonder if that log says somethin'
about Deus Maris's Ruby?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
'I heard about a mighty gem called the
Deus Maris's Ruby today! Alas, it's hidden
in a pirate lair, so I'll probably
never lay eyes on it...'

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
A pirate lair? Yar, I be knowin' where that
be, minnows—and this ghost ship will sail
us there straightaway!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Marine_researcher
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
It got away AGAIN!? Dang, dang, daaang!
My pursuit of the beast will never end!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_EQUIPMENT_00.text:
Yar, he be vanishin'...and I be mighty
confused as to what that all be about!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
The space between life and death? Yar, nothin'
be different, except there be no livin' things.
Still, I never knew it would be so quiet 
without pirates about.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
This be a maze designed to trap outsiders.
But pirates are raised here, so we should
be all right.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text: Reckon you know this place, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Yar, though I was born and raised here,
I be no pirate. Anyway, this be the office for the
White Whale captain. If the ruby
be anywhere, it be here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text: Hush now! I hear voices.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text: Spare your pity and kill me already!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Ya got the wrong idea! I just need ya to
answer one little question for me, Azure:
where's me heart hidden? I know it be somewhere in the Sea Betwixt,
and I know YOU know where—so why is it
ya never took the chance to destroy it and
kill me off for good?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Deus Maris made you immortal, Baltasar—
and as his guardian, I would never dream
of going against his wishes. So no, Baltasar. I won't kill you.
Instead, I will guard your heart
and your immortality forever!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Oh, I get ya, lass. Thing is, I just wanna keep
me heart with me at all times—helps me
rest easier at night, see? So c'mon now.
Tell me where ya hid it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Now I'm REALLY never going to tell you.
Also, you must know you can't keep me
here for long; I'll traverse the
Sea Betwixt and escape this place.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Ah, but you need the Blue Demon for that,
right? And since ya don't have yer ship,
I've nothin' to be afraid of! Actually, that gives me an idea: I'm gonna
go sink yer damn ship and nip this right in
the bud! Stay there, lass! Back in two shakes!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Ivar! I know you're there, Ivar,
and I know you just heard everything!
The guardians' Blue Demon is in danger,
and I need you to warn them right now.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Aye, lass—but we be lookin' for the ruby,
and I'll not leave this place without it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text: I don't think she can hear us.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
You'll find Deus Maris's Ruby in an underground
vault. It's protected by a unique trap created
by Sigurd, but I imagine his son will have
little trouble disarming it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Now be quick! If the Blue Demon sinks,
all is lost.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text: Let's hurry to that vault!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
The ruby's just out here in the open?
Heck, it's like they WANT us to steal it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Aye, but that just means the trap
protectin' it'll be all the worse.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text: And your daddy made this trap?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Aye, me birth father, Sigurd the pirate—
but I still can't make heads or tails of
it! I almost died once here for Baltasar,
and I'll not be doin' it again.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Well then, why not let us take a crack?
Might be easier than we think.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_PIRATES_HIDE.text:
Yeee-haw! Ruby obtained! I kinda want
to sit a spell and catch m'breath, but we
gotta head off and tell the Blue Demon.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
There's the Blue Demon—
and it's under attack!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
Ivar, child of pirates...
Save Azure. Save our guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
Stow it, ye ghostly mumbler!
That be an impossible request!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text: Where be your compass pointin', Pony?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
One's pointing to the shipyard,
and the other to Dead Man's Bay.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
Yar, we best be headin' to Dead Man's Bay
if we want to save Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_DRAGON_.text:
But hear me first, lasses:
yer bodies be lookin' a bit...transparent. I know ye had yer own goal, and I'd not see
ye get wrapped up in this any more than ye
already are. This be a problem for the people
of the Mare Nostrum, aye?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
The hell!? Yer not Azure! I've been waiting here for
twenty-five years, and when someone finally visits,
it's my damn son—who grew up to be an utter fool! Bah. Why is it that nothing ever
works out for ol' Sigurd?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text: You know this guy, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Aye. 'Tis me father, Sigurd the Pirate,
leader of the White Whales.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Can't really fathom why yer wanderin' the
Sea Betwixt, boy, but since yer my son,
I'll be hearin' ya out.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Gar, since ye were once Baltasar's true
friend, I was hopin' ye might be knowin'
the location of his heart. I figure it
be here in the Sea Betwixt, but—

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
His FRIEND!? That shambling heap of carrion
stole the White Whales from me! I'd crush
his damn heart in my fist if I could!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text: But sadly, I can't. The Sea Betwixt be the only place where his heart is safe. He's going to live forever— he's going to rot forever.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Well, Baltasar's been lookin' for his heart.
In the meantime, we'll help ourselves to this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Nay, cully! That be my one possession,
and it comes with a price to match!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text: Aye, but we be broke.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Then here's my price: take me out of here.
Azure may not have given me the go-ahead,
but I know YOU will...right, Ivar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Did ye not slaughter the guardians?
Nay, I can't be takin' ye anywhere—
but I still need that heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Fine then, ya ungrateful whelp!
If ya think ya can take it,
shoot yer shot!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Say, you wouldn't happen to have
a triangle like this on you?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Who in the briny depths are ye,
and how'd ye know of the triangle?
Don't go tellin' me them Quisstatium
scoundrels have abandoned me!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Well, if you've got a triangle,
I'd love to take it off yer hands.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Shut yer trap! I'll give ya Baltasar's heart
if ya want it, but you can pry this triangle
from my cold, dead fingers!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Do ye know what ye've done to yer
poor old man, ya ungrateful child!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Sounds like we'll be takin' us
a heart AND a triangle, then.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
Damn you, ya bilge-drinking ogre!
Curse ya! Blast yer bastard bones!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_0.text:
I ain't never met a curse
what worried me none.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
You really brought me the gems?
But no one's EVER done that before!
Well, whatever. Show them to me! Quickly!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Heh heh! Oh yes, this should be more than
enough power for me to bring your little
ghost ship back to life.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
I can indeed! That said, this is the
Sea Betwixt, so think of me as less of
a builder and more of...a shaman! Also, this is my first time doing this,
so I sure hope it works! Heh heh heh!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
No choice but to let him try and pray
he be havin' some skill, minnows.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Whoops! Almost forgot. Before I start,
tell me about your adventure—and REALLY
pump up the thrills, because I think
that'll make this all go better.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Yar, then settle in for a whale of a tale!
So the adventurers were leavin' the shipyard,
guided by Pony and Cornelia's eerie power...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
...And then the ship comes back to life!
Gar, that be the end of me tale.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
What an adventure...
But it's not finished yet!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Aye, so it's not! That's why we be needin'
a ship, for the next part of our tale
takes place in the Sea of the Livin'.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
So the ship I revive will show me the
rest of the adventure? How fantastic!
Oh, I feel more motivated than ever!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Hear me, gems! Fill this ship with life
and return it to the living, so it may
sail the seas once again! Heh heh heh!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Gar, this be me ship! The Sea Turtle!
The one Baltasar sank!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Ahhh, I haven't done work that good in a
long time. Thought I might actually find
peace and pass on, but... Eh, oh well. Oh, and don't forget that ships have lives.
Treat her well.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Since you're back, I assume you have
both gems? If so, your ship will
assuredly come back to life!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Hear me, gems! Fill this ship with life
and return it to the living, so it may
sail the seas once again! Heh heh heh!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Gar, this be me ship! The Sea Turtle!
The one Baltasar sank!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.speaker: Shipyardghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_999.text:
Ahh, another job well done by me.
Thought I might actually find peace
and pass on, but... Eh, oh well. Oh, and don't forget that ships have lives.
Treat her well.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_010.text: It be time to save Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_010.text: I think Baltasar's by that cyclone.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Yer compass brought us here, minnows,
which means Dues Maris be grantin'
us a wish. But Baltasar has the egg,
and he be immortal.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Whuppin' him in battle and takin' the egg
ain't gonna be easy, but immortal don't mean
invincible. He's got SOME kind of weakness.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Are ye that confident ye can go
toe to toe with Baltasar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Just watch us, pardner!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Ivar? But HOW!? I sunk yer ship!
Sent it to the briny depths!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Yer not the only immortal one here,
Baltasar! Yar, and I'm not the one
that's got business with ye—that be
these minnows from an outer ocean.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
See, we made Deus Maris a li'l promise
that we'd be the ones to hatch the egg,
so you'll need to be handin' it over.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
The other oceans are filled with fools!
Do ya not know what 'immortal' means? Fine then. Come here so I can show ya—
and then take that knowledge back to
yer fool home!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
All right, all right! I get it! Yer strong!
Now just lemme go, and I'll give ya
a chance to wish on the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Well, ain't that sweet.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
So what's this 'little promise' ye made
with Deus Maris? When'd ye do that?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Deus Maris brought us to these here waters
so we'd grant his wish, 'cause he apparently
can't do that all on his lonesome.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
And his wish is for us to take this
here triangle out of the Mare Nostrum.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Are you ready then, Deus Maris?
I'm makin' your wishes come true!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: So long, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Take care, minnows!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Now everything's back to the way
it was at the beginning.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Except I've lost the Blue Demon.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Well hey, hop aboard if ye want.
I need all the hands I can get.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Ivar? But HOW!? I sunk yer ship!
Sent it to the briny depths!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Yer not the only immortal one here,
Baltasar. Also, I've got yer heart,
just as ye asked.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Bwaaa ha ha! I'm so proud of ya, boy!
Now everything's ready for me to wish
on the egg. Aye, and I promise you'll
get somethin' out of this, too.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Nay, Baltasar, I'll be the one makin' the
wishes here. I propose a trade: yer heart
for the egg. And no monkey business,
or I'll be crushin' yer heart in me fists!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Yar, I take it all back! Yer Sigurd's son
through and through: a bilge-drinkin'
scoundrel to the last!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
I treated ye like me father, just as ye
wanted. Now take yer heart and go!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
I hope you're not planning to make any
stupid pirate wishes, Ivar—because I
absolutely can't allow that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Hear me, O Deus Maris! Set Azure
free from her role as guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
And in her stead, let me
be protectin' yer eggs.
...Happy?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Ivar, you...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
How am I supposed to be savin' ye otherwise?
I'm not a clever man—this is all I could be
comin' up with. Cornelia? Pony? I'm trustin' ye to take
Azure back to yer ocean. May ye both find 
happiness in the waters beyond!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Water...from my eyes?
What does this mean?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
You've been freed from guardianship,
pardner. I reckon this was Deus Maris's
true wish all along.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text: Ivar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
We found the Blue Demon!
But how are we supposed to warn 'em?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Yar, but Baltasar's ship be close!
Quick! Hide in the Sea Betwixt!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
You are Ivar, son of Sigurd.
Child of the loathsome man who
slaked his thirst with our blood.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Yar, that not be matterin' now!
I got orders from Azure, so begone
from here before Baltasar attacks!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
You vexing, cursed child.
You bring naught but ill news.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: Ready the attack!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: Damn! They disappeared!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Does this mean we made it in time?
Also, sure seems like they could've
gotten away without us.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
A ship can't move without orders from its
captain, and that includes the Blue Demon.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Just so, Captain Ivar—I sensed Azure's
orders in your voice. Is she all right?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Aye, for now. Baltasar be levelheaded for
a pirate, so he'll not be rippin' Azure to
shreds and killin' her—but that don't mean
we can just leave her in his clutches.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Not until we sense Azure's orders.
For perhaps she wanted to be
captured by Baltasar all along.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: Sounds like she's got a plan.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: She does—one you know not.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Aye, so be it. But I've a request: we be
needin' yer help to get Deus Maris's
Sapphire from the blue hole.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Very well. Consider this repayment for
my debt, Ivar, son of Sigurd the Terrible.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: Can we get our living ship now?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Aye, but let's hurry, minnows—
we're lookin' a bit transparent.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Well, shoot—you're right!
Can you steer this ship?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: Aye, lass. I'll make do.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Once you return to the Sea of the Living,
Ivar, you will no longer be able to obtain
Baltasar's heart. Do you still wish to
set sail immediately?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Baltasar and Azure be talkin' about that,
but it's nothin' to do with me. Besides,
Azure swore to guard his heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
That is indeed Azure's promise,
for she is a guardian of Deus Maris.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Gar, belay that talk! I be the captain of a
trade ship—not a pirate, and not a guardian!
So don't go tryin' to make me think takin' the
heart of the man who raised me be a fine idea.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
And you, sailors from an outer ocean?
What if Baltasar's heart proves key
to the triangle you seek?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Hang on there—why do YOU know about that?
Were you eavesdropping on what Deus Maris
was saying?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Protector
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text: I know because Azure is a guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Where be yer compass pointin', minnows?
The shipyard, or Baltasar's heart?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Both—so where we go is up to us.
But it seems like Baltasar's heart
is over in Dead Man's Bay.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
Aye, that be a fittin' hiding spot for
a heart—but I'll leave the final
decision up to ye, minnows.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BLUE_HOLE_10.text:
If it don't matter which one we go to,
that means we'll get our chance to find
the triangle no matter what we do.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_110.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_110.text:
Yar, let's go help Azure.
Where be Baltasar now?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_110.text:
The name Dead Man's Bay don't really
make my hat flip off my head...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Ivar? But HOW!? I sunk yer ship!
Sent it to the briny depths!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yer not the only immortal
one here, Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Ivar, his heart...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Baltasar's heart be at the bottom of the bay.
But the only one who can be retrievin' it
is Azure and the Blue Demon.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Is that true? How the hell
do ya know all that!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Plenty happened after ye sunk me ship,
and that was but one'a the things
I learned out there. I speak true: if ye be freein' Azure,
she can get yer heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Or she'll take the heart and sail away!
Do ya take me for a fool!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Then I'll stay here as yer hostage,
while the minnow goes with her.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Hey, don't go volunteerin' me!
You know Azure ain't the type
to just blindly follow orders!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Bwaaa ha ha! I don't think guardians are all
that loyal to begin with, but at least we
can have some fun until the egg hatches! Oh, and if ya don't come back, Azure, I'm gonna
give Ivar's blood to Deus Maris. Can't wait
to see what he'll wish for when that happens!
Bwaaa ha ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: I be countin' on ye, minnow.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Ain't got no choice here;
Captain Ivar's life is on the line.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Hold it right there, lady! Don't go doin'
things without tellin' me first!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: I do as I like.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Over my dead body, darlin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Now let's go rustle us up a heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Hmph. You will regret this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Well, well! If it ain't Azure! Glad to see ya,
lass—how long's it been? Also, don't think ya
know how happy I am that ya remembered me!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
That won't work on me, you sly dog!
I've no business with you—my business
lies with Baltasar's heart alone.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yar, but I love that icy side of ya. I know
it only means your fire can burn even hotter,
and I wanna see that heat more than anything!
So here! Take as many hearts as ya want!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Bwa ha ha! Oh, yer face! Can't believe
ya actually BELIEVED me just now! Aye, I've been listenin' to ya talk,
and I know me son's life is on the line.
Now ain't that interestin'...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
You're Captain Ivar's daddy? Heck, ya don't
look a day older than him—if anything,
I'd say Ivar looks a mite more haggard.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yar, let's be talkin' about the egg.
How are we gonna get it out of
Baltasar's grubby hands?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
You're the last person I'd give the egg
to, Sigurd. I'd rather Baltasar have it!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Ah, then my son's life be over.
What a short, pathetic life he had.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I won't stand for a daddy speakin'
about his own son like that!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
The adults are talkin' here, lass.
Now stow it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Careful, Sigurd. These women are sailors from
an outer ocean, and Deus Maris himself has
permitted them to remain in the Mare Nostrum.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Apologies, lasses. Now what say we work
together to make our dreams a reality?
Ya wanna save Ivar? Fine. I take the egg,
you take my son. That sound fair?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
You forget a key point, Sigurd:
you must board the Blue Demon if
you want to leave the Sea Betwixt.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Bwa ha ha! Sorry, sailors from an outer ocean,
but I've decided to work with dear Azure here.
She'll take the heart, and I'll take the egg.
Sound good? Good!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Who in the heck is this
insufferable feller, Azure!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
That's Sigurd the pirate, Ivar's blood father
and captain of the White Whales. He is a
terrible man—one who slaughtered a great
many of my fellow guardians. He wished for eternal youth on
Deus Maris's egg, and must now live on
the Sea Betwixt for all of eternity.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
So it's four of us together, eh? Well,
I'll be takin' the egg, Azure gets the
heart, and the strange lasses take Ivar.
That should do it, by gar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
This is why I didn't want to come here!
Gods, I cannot stand this man. Very well, then. I'll leave
the final decision to you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
About dang time you negotiated with us.
Now then, pardner, you got a lead on
any triangles what look like this?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: How do ya know about the triangle?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Because we're from Quisstatium.
Now hand it over.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yer mistaken if ye think this'll go
the way ya want it to, lasses!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
It's yer fault I went through hell!
Curse all ya bastards!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Will you give the heart to Baltasar?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Captain Ivar trusted us with this,
and right now he's waitin' for us.
Ain't nothing else what matters.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I suppose I should repay the man
as well, seeing as he risked his
life for my freedom.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
So what is this triangle
you obtained from him?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Deus Maris asked YOU a favor!?
But he's never asked us guardians
to do anything for him...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
All right, Baltasar, here's your heart.
Now hand over Captain Ivar!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: No need. Your immortality ends here!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Ya lyin' dog, Azure!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Nooo!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Baltasar is dead, and Sigurd remains
trapped in the Sea Betwixt. At last,
I have fulfilled my duty as a guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: What'll be happenin' to the egg?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Well, seeing as you risked your life
to save me, I suppose it's only fair...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Hear my wish, O Deus Maris, and release me
from my position as your last guardian!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Yar, not bad, lass! I think ye worked
hard enough to earn that.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Thank you, Ivar. I... ...I'm sorry, Deus Maris?
What was that?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Best of luck, lass!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Don't give up!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
No. This is Deus Maris's will, and I can
only find freedom in death. And as I am a
guardian, I must obey that will to the end!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Do what ya gotta do, Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: We ain't gonna stand by and watch!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Azure...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Gar, I see. Ye were brought here by
Deus Maris to see through Azure's end.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
This is our prize for getting the triangle!?
Well, shoot. Guess this is so long, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Farewell, minnows! May the winds
be always at yer backs!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I have gone against Deus Maris's will,
and no longer have a place here in the
Mare. As such, I would ask that you
take me to your other ocean, strangers.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Deus Maris planned all this. He summoned us
to the Mare Nostrum, we got the triangle from
Sigurd and fought for your sake, and now we're
up and takin' you away from here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
So the triangle was a little treat
to keep us working? Clever.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Thank you for your guidance, O Deus Maris!
I will never forget these seas!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Please take care of matters for me,
Ivar. Keep safe Deus Maris's eggs.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, on me life. Farewell, Azure!
And thanks to ye, Pony and Cornelia.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
So ya finally came to me, eh, Ivar? It's only been
twenty-five damn years! Also, if I can give ya some
advice, don't go wishin' for eternal youth—it ain't
all it's cracked up to be.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: You know this feller, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yar, ye know me, cully? Have we met?
Nay, this is the Sea Betwixt. There be
no living person here, which means...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I see the light dawn in yer eyes!
Aye, Ivar! I be yer father: the great
pirate Sigurd, leader of the White Whales!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
The day of the egg's hatching draws ever closer,
and I knew it was but a matter'a time until
Azure's meddlin' drew ya to me. Tell it true:
ya came for Baltasar's heart, did ya not?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Azure be a sin-filled dog who tried to get
you to kill the man that raised ya! Aye,
and that ruthlessness is what draws ya in.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Smile, Ivar! This be a touchin' reunion with
yer old man, and ya got NO idea how happy
it makes me to know my life on the
Sea Betwixt is about to end.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I wished for eternal youth on the last egg
while Baltasar wished for immortality,
and this here is what we got. I was sent to this brine-damned place along
with Baltasar's heart—a place where time
don't pass. THAT'S the trick to my eternal
youth, lad, as well as Baltasar's immortality.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
But by gar, this place be dull! Oh, I hear
voices from the Sea of the Living, but I
can't do nothin' about 'em! There's nothin' to spend treasure on, no food
to satisfy my non-existent hunger—Oh, and don't
get me talkin' about the lack of comely lasses!
Aye, all I got with me are the rotting dead.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
The damn Deus Maris cheated me and Baltasar both.
Hell, that guy lost his heart and became the dead!
I know, because I can smell the fool all the way
from this plane of existence.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Gar, but ye talk a blue streak—too bad
I don't give a ripe fart for yer sad story!
Now tell me where ye be hidin' the heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Hidin'? Oh, I'm not hidin' anything.
It's right over there.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Fair warning, though: ya can't hurt that
thing. Can't crush it, can't stab it,
can't shoot it. Can't do nothin' to
the damn thing in the Sea Betwixt.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
So here, lad. Take it. Give it to Azure,
give it to Baltasar, do as ya will.
I don't care, 'cause I know whatever
ya do is gonna cause a riot!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Shoot, don't mind if we—

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
ON ONE CONDITION! Ya gotta bring me back to the
Sea of the Living on yer ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
And are ye gonna wish on the egg
when ye make it back?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Yar, and ya'd do the same—but whose wish will
Deus Maris heed!? Bwaaa ha ha ha! It's gonna
be a merciless battle royale!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
I imagine it be Deus Maris's will that
ye be allowed to leave this place,
so fine. Come along, if ye like.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
You seen any triangles
that look like this?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
Aye, I look at one every day.
It's because of this blasted thing
that I ended up like this.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text: Well then, hand it over!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_DEATH_COVE_1.text:
If my wish comes true, I'll give it to ye;
I won't need it if that happens.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.text:
Yar, we make for Baltasar's ship!
I bet the lout's heart is gonna show
us somethin' veeery interesting.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.text:
Who died and made him trail boss?
What should we do, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SHIPYARD_120.text:
We've no choice but to follow him
and learn what Azure be thinkin'.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Me heart! Oh, I'm proud of ya, son...
so proud, I'm gonna make YER wish
come true, too!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
No, Ivar! Give me the heart! We cannot
permit the pirates to make any more
of their senseless wishes!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: What're we doing here, Captain?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: I be givin' the heart to Baltasar.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: I be givin' the heart to Azure.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Ye can have yer damnable heart back,
Baltasar—but I be takin' the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Fine, whatever. This egg don't mean
nothin' when set against me heart.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Now hear me well, boy: I know I caused
ya plenty of pain, but I did it outta love.
So you'll make me wish come true, aye?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Don't listen to that pirate's rubbish, Ivar!
Give the egg to a guardian so the Mare can
return to being the happy sea it once was.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Why'd ye make me claim Baltasar's heart, Azure!?
Were ye plannin' to have me dirty me hands with
killin' him while yer own stayed clean—and all
while leadin' Deus Maris astray!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Ivar, listen to—

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Oh, ignore this lass, Ivar. I've been tricked
by guardians more times than I can count—
though I eventually went and hung 'em for it.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sigurd!? Ivar, please don't tell me you
brought him here from the Sea Betwixt!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, my precious son brought me here as an
envoy of Deus Maris. Brought me back to
the Sea of the Living on his ship, so he did! Fate be on my side, Baltasar, which is
why I'm takin' the White Whales back!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
This is YER fault, ya daft jellyfish!
YER the one who worded yer wish funny! Yar, don't listen to him, Ivar...
Not unless ya wanna end up like me.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Stow it, all of ye! I know what I be wishin' for,
and it's to get out of this coral-blasted ocean
for good and all! I'm sick of it, by gar!
Sick to death of it all!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
And the one who'll be makin' that wish come true
is ye, Pony and Cornelia. Aye, we best be getting'
outta this hellhole together, minnows, so go on.
Make yer wish.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sorry, Captain, but we ain't got our
triangle yet and can't leave until we do.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Then I'll be makin' my wish!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Stop rushin' it, ya daft cod!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I won't let you negotiate with Sigurd!
I'll destroy all of you associated
with this triangle!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Ahhh... It's finally quiet now that all of
my obstacles are gone. Right, let's trade.
You take the triangle, I take the egg. Deal?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Reckon that's fair.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: You're in no position to deal.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I don't wanna end up like Baltasar and Azure...
Fine then! You take the triangle AND the egg!
Take it all! How's that for a deal?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Real smart—just like Sigurd the Great
should be. C'mon, Captain. We're leaving.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, time to bid farewell
to these decrepit waters.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Farewell, me sea...
Farewell, me Mare Nostrum...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
And just like that, all my nuisances are gone.
Guess I'll just take it easy while I wait for
the next egg. The era of Sigurd awaits!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I was never able to put an end to
this heart in the Sea Betwixt,
but I can in the Sea of the Living!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Baltasar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Gar, ye filthy woman!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
At last, I can fulfill my
duty as a guardian.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Bwaaa ha ha! Thanks a ton, lass!
Got me the egg without liftin' a finger!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sigurd!? Ivar, please don't tell me you
brought him here from the Sea Betwixt!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Aye, my precious son brought me here as an
envoy of Deus Maris! Brought me back to
the Sea of the Living on his ship, so he did!
See, Baltasar? Fate be on my side!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: This is... This is terrible. The worst possible pirate has gotten his hands on the egg.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Hold a moment there, Pa. Weren't
ye wantin' a battle royale? I've no
intention of lettin' ye make a wish
to Deus Maris so easy.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Too bad, lad! Yer out of time!
The egg's gonna hatch in my arms!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Now, Deus Maris! Make me wish come
true! Give me the best life as a pirate:
treasure, feasts, grog, and women!
I be wantin' it all! Bwaaa ha ha!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Reckon I'd be hard-pressed to
think of a more stereotypical
pirate wish. Someone's been
watchin' too many pictures.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Azure
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Sigurd, you truly are the best pirate
to ever sail the open seas. How is it
that I did not realize it until now?
I give my all as a guardian unto you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: What!?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Father, I beg ye to make me into the best
pirate there ever was! I'm proud as anything
to be yer son, and I hope ye can forgive me
for bein' so green in the piratin' ways.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
No, not you too, Captain...
Deus Maris's power is terrifyin'!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Good! Good on all of ya! Now's let all that
transpired between us be water under the
bridge, for Sigurd the pirate has a heart
broad as the Mare Nostrum herself!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
My wish came true, so this is yours.
Now get outta here with yer Deus Maris!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: You sure about this, Deus Maris?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Hear me, Deus Maris! Grant my wish!
Make me the strongest being 
in all of the Mare Nostrum!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Heck, that sounds like a wish
some durn kid would make.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Siguld
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Then you're about to be beaten to a pulp
