by the most powerful child in the world!
Oh, and I'll be taking that triangle back;
I still got some use for the little guy!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text: Never trust a pirate.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
I think we're lucky he wished to be the
strongest in the Mare Nostrum; we'd have
lost if he wished to be the greatest in the
universe or the Twilight Area or something.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_1.text:
Well, we're gonna shake our spurs
and mosey on outta here, Captain.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ghost1
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Yar, I be so annoyed and bitter...
I'll never be forgivin' that woman!
Somebody fight me! I'll take ye all on!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text: Yar, this be a pirate Azure killed.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Boy, she sure got you all riled up.
Well, if fighting you will give you
peace, we'll do it.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ghost1
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Gar, I was meant to rule the Mare Nostrum!
If only I be havin' Deus Maris's egg!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Pirates really cotton to the idea
of rulin' stuff, don't they?
Can't say I'm much surprised.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_000.text:
Yar, I not be understandin' pirates,
for I be not one.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I have to give this back to...
But wait, where is...?
Where am I...?

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
This is the Sea Betwixt, darlin'.
You lookin' for someone?

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I... I can't remember the name. I've been
here so long that my memory is...lost.
But I think...they're at the harbor?

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ghost2
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Please... Take this and give it to them...
I have no time left...

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
An axe? 'Tis a bit rusted, but...
Gar, hold on!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Aye, I see. If we get back to life,
let's be returnin' this to the owner.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Looks like it rings a bell for you.
Well then, we'll hang onto this
until we make it back to life.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
Well, well! If it isn't Ivar! I heard you sunk
to the bottom of the seas and left this world.
...Er, you're not a ghost or anything, right?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text: Nay, ye blind barnacle! I be alive!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
That's...that's my axe!
Where did you find it?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I lent that axe to the man I loved—but when
he went off to hunt pirates, I never saw
him again. I'd thought this lost at sea...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text: Ye used to use that axe, lass?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: SouthHarbourmaster
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
I had my own reckless youth,
thank you very much! But here. Take this new axe as
thanks for returning my own.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_010.text:
The less we think about this, the better.
In fact, let's just forget it ever happened.
Gar, and here I was thinkin' ghosts were
as spooky as things were gonna get today...

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
The ship itself still be havin'
powerful, unresolved feelings.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
I ain't some superhero, Captain;
I can't sense feelings from a ship.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Yar, I see... The ship wants us to find out
where it be! We'll be searchin' for it when
we return to life.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Well, shoot. Guess we just gotta get
back to life and worry about it later.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
We're here, but I don't
see no ships.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Gar, I see shipwrecked parts scattered all
over the place... Perhaps it merely be
wantin' to return to the sea?

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
This is getting fishier by the minute,
but I reckon we'll give it a shot.
Come here and help me, Captain.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Yar, a raft also be a ship.
Well done, minnow!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Feels a mite strange sendin' off an
empty raft. Maybe ships really DO
have feelings after all.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Aye, and I wager this ship be deeply
touched as well. Fine job indeed.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
Hang on, we got something here!
A gift of thanks from the ship?
Well, that'll do me fine.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
What? Fine, I'll be doin' it.
Give it here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_020.text:
She's a bit off-kilter, but it be fine,
for a raft also be a ship! Well done, me!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
I pray someone might hear my song!
Listen and remember and pass it along!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: Ye want us to remember yer song?

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Exactly. Do you think you can remember
what I sing, then pass the message on? ...I'll take that as a yes. Right, then!
Settle down and listen to what I call
the Ballad of the Lighthouse!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Way up atop the lighthouse
lived a science man!
He made a great big something
that he kept from all the land!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
So we just tell the scientist:
you must join that green wire!
Just slap that thing together
and your skill we will admire! Doobie doobie do! She bop bop BAO!
Scat doobide dat and a la la la!
Ha cha cha cha!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ghost3
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Hooo! Okay, I feel a lot better.
Thanks for listening, byeee!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Sang itself to peace? Ain't that sweet.
Guess we should hurry up and pass on the
message to the scientist in the lighthouse.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Shoot! Didn't see you there.
Anyway, we got a message for you.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Well? Get to it already!
I'm a very busy man.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Yar, it be somethin' about a wire,
but the color escapes me...

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join that red wire!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join that blue wire!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text: You must join that green wire!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Huh? Wait, is that all I needed to do!?
Excelsior! Just wait here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Oh, bless you! I finally solved it
after so many years! And since that was my magnum opus,
you'd best enjoy it once you return
to life! Hee hee!

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Wonder what this magnum opus is supposed
to be? I reckon we'll find out when we finally
get back to life.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Huh? Wait, is that all I needed to do!?
Excelsior! Just wait here.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: scientist_Ghost
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Tarnation! I failed miserably
and it's all YOUR fault! Eh, oh well. At this point, I'll just
enjoy myself here in the Sea Betwixt.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_SUBQUEST_030.text:
Well, he seemed happy, despite failin'.
Maybe it's comfortable here for spooks.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Please, someone save poor little me!
My fiancé was killed by fiends!
HEY! HEY! IT'S ME, PEDRO THE FIEND! GET OUTTA HERE, HUMANS!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Nope. That's a fiend. Feller literally
just called himself Pedro the Fiend.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: ペドロ
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: I'M A FIEND! A TERRIBLE FIEND! RUN AWAY! RUN, COWARDS!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Heck, all that squawkin' makes me
just wanna do the opposite!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunny_Architect
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Well, that's just sloppy! We can't
do our work if you act like that.

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text:
Avast, ye be the thieves! The ones trickin'
honest folk outta their belongings! Avast,
but that be worse than piratin', says I!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: ペドロ
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: NOPE! NOPE! JUST CLEARING MY THROAT! HERE! TAKE IT BACK! EVERYTHING I STOLE! OH, AND HERE'S SOME LOOT! NICE LOOT! FOUND IT ON THE GROUND AND EVERYTHING!

SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W04_GIMK_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_BIRD_000_CUT.text: Leave him! He's a waste of time.

SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.speaker: UI
SUB_W04_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTSHIP_NORTH_TRADE_.text: Bonnie Blair's maximum LP decreased by 1.
